# Launch Calendar Template

**Purpose:** Track all tasks leading up to launch day  
**Owner:** Marketing Lead + Founder  
**Format:** Use this as a Google Sheets, Notion Table, or Airtable base  

---

## USAGE INSTRUCTIONS

1. **Duplicate this template** in your project management tool
2. **Assign owners** to each task (tag team members)
3. **Set deadlines** based on your launch date (Day 0 = Launch Day)
4. **Update status daily** during countdown (use standup meetings)
5. **Add notes** for blockers, dependencies, or context

---

## POST-LAUNCH TASKS (Week 1)

| Date | Day | Owner | Task | Priority | Status | Notes |
|------|-----|-------|------|----------|--------|-------|
| Feb 1 | Day +1 | All | Monitor metrics (signups, sales, traffic, errors) | P0 | ğŸ“‹ To Do | Hourly checks |
| Feb 1 | Day +1 | Engineering | Fix friction points (P0 and P1 bugs) | P0 | ğŸ“‹ To Do | Deploy immediately |
| Feb 1 | Day +1 | Marketing | Boost top creators (social shoutouts, email features) | P1 | ğŸ“‹ To Do | Celebrate wins |
| Feb 1 | Day +1 | Youth Success | Spotlight youth earners (leaderboard highlights) | P1 | ğŸ“‹ To Do | Social posts |
| Feb 2 | Day +2 | Marketing | Retarget diaspora (ads to visitors who didn't purchase) | P1 | ğŸ“‹ To Do | Meta + TikTok |
| Feb 2 | Day +2 | Marketing | Email follow-up #1 (non-converters: "See what you missed") | P1 | ğŸ“‹ To Do | Segment list |
| Feb 2 | Day +2 | Creative | Social recap video (Day 1 highlights) | P2 | ğŸ“‹ To Do | Quick edit |
| Feb 3 | Day +3 | Marketing | Creator spotlight wave 2 (5 new testimonials) | P1 | ğŸ“‹ To Do | Record + edit |
| Feb 3 | Day +3 | Youth Success | Youth challenge check-in (leaderboard update) | P1 | ğŸ“‹ To Do | Social post |
| Feb 3 | Day +3 | PR Lead | Press follow-up (thank media outlets, share coverage) | P2 | ğŸ“‹ To Do | Personal emails |
| Feb 5 | Day +5 | Marketing | Weekly metrics report (share with team and investors) | P0 | ğŸ“‹ To Do | Dashboard link |
| Feb 5 | Day +5 | Marketing | Identify top-performing channels (double down on winners) | P1 | ğŸ“‹ To Do | ROI analysis |
| Feb 5 | Day +5 | Youth Success | Plan next challenge (DominionYouth Challenge #2) | P2 | ğŸ“‹ To Do | Brainstorm ideas |
| Feb 7 | Day +7 | All | Post-launch debrief (team retrospective) | P0 | ğŸ“‹ To Do | 60-min call |

---

## STATUS LEGEND

- âœ… **Done** â€” Task completed
- ğŸ”„ **In Progress** â€” Currently being worked on
- ğŸ“‹ **To Do** â€” Not started yet
- â¸ï¸ **Blocked** â€” Waiting on dependency or decision
- âŒ **Cancelled** â€” No longer needed

---

## PRIORITY LEGEND

- **P0 (Critical)** â€” Launch blocker, must be done
- **P1 (High)** â€” Important for successful launch
- **P2 (Medium)** â€” Nice-to-have, can push if needed
- **P3 (Low)** â€” Post-launch optimization

---

## NOTES

- **Daily standup:** 9:00 AM during launch week (15 minutes)
- **War room:** Slack channel `#launch-war-room` (active Day -1 to Day +7)
- **Decision-making:** Founder has final say on all go/no-go decisions
- **Communication:** Tag owners in comments for urgent issues

---
